trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Bainbridge Island
There were no other sightings in Bainbridge Island on or around August 26th 2011
divs: sighting detailsat 11:11 pm on evening of august 26th my son and i were driving home when we both notice disc shaped ufo above and about a 1-2 mile in front of us and it descended at 45 degree angle down to earth at 2,000 mph plus ... 10-15 times faster than any plan i had ever seen. whole thing lasted 1-2 seconds. the vehicle was as bright as the moon and seemed to be emitting a blue \greem light from underside or belly of ufo. it appear to land in the woods to the left of use but there was not sound, not crash, no nothing other than it disappeared into the woods. i have always believed that the possibility of ufo's existed...now after experiencing what i witnessed tonight...i have no doubt ufo's exist.
Summary: My son and I both saw a disc shaped vehicle as bright as the moon desend rapid to earth 20X faster than a plane.
